marks:
Oharame no
?? tsukau
kuroki-uri
Iro no sioki ha Fujimaro hitsu
medium: Hanging scroll; ink, color, and gofun on silk
text:
Oharame were girls who brought in faggots for charcoal from Ohara, a village near Kyoto.
The poem above reads: 'The white complexions of the oharame are more noticeable than the black brushwood they are balancing on their heads.'
title: Two Oharame on the Bank of a Stream
